Kim Berman (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa.
Berman nwetara BFA na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand tupu ọ gaa MFA ya na Mahadim Tufts
Ọ kụziri na School of the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston site na 1988 rụọ 1992, ma na-enyere áká n'ọmụmụ ihe site n'ọtụtụ ihe fọdụrụ na 1990s
Ka ógè na-aga n'ọrụ ya, ọ laghachiri South Africa, ebe ọ na-etinye aka na mmepe nke ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ

Ugbu a ọ bụ ónyé nduzi nke Artist Proof Studio na Newtown, Johannesburg, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkuzi dị elu na ngalaba nka nke Technikon na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand na Mahadụ nke Johannesburg. Otu ihe osise 1999 nke Berman na mezzotint, drypoint, na ihe osise na akwụkwọ, nke akpọrọ Playing Cards of the Truth Commission, a Incomplete Deck, bụ nke National Museum of African Art, dị ka akwụkwọ ndị na-ese ihe nke afọ 1997 Emandulo Re-Creation, nke o nyéré áká na ya dị ka ónyé otu Artist Proof Studio. Mbipụta 2001, Break the Silence, dị na nchịkọta nke Museum of Modern Art.
